job_details.experience_required: At least six [6] years of hands-on experience in Azure architecture and related technologies
job_details.degree_required: Graduation from an accredited four-year college or university with a degree in computer science or a related field

jd: From: manindra, schrilltech manindra@schrilltech.com Reply to: manindra@schrilltech.com Hi Good Morning,Hope you are doing wellWe have a position for the below requirement.ONLY LOCALSRole: Cloud ArchitectLocation: Austin,TX || Remote Duration : 6-12 MonthsClient: State of TXRequired Qualifications:This position requires strong experience in Azure architecture, including the design and implementation of scalable solutions, as well as proficiency in Microsoft technologies such as .NET Core, C#, MS SQL Server, SSIS and Azure DevOps. The ideal candidate will also be skilled in developing custom integrations and managing infrastructure within Azure environments.·Architectural Design: Develop and implement scalable Azure solutions tailored to the needs of the Mainframe Transformation project.·Technical Expertise: Leverage strong knowledge of Microsoft technologies, including .NET Core, C#, MS SQL Server, Azure DevOps, and SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS).·Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of Azure solutions with existing systems and applications, including those based on C#, SQL Server, and ASP.NET MVC.·DevOps Practices: Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps to automate deployments and streamline development workflows.·Custom Integrations: Design and manage custom integrations within Azure environments to enhance application functionality (MuleSoft, Go-Anywhere, SFTP etc.)·Performance Optimization: Enhance assigned applications, address production issues, and ensure optimal performance of Azure solutions.·ETL Processes: Utilize SSIS for developing and maintaining ETL processes to facilitate data migration and transformation between systems. (Nice to have)·Infrastructure Management: Maintain Azure infrastructure for both production and non-production environments, ensuring optimal performance and availability. (Nice to have)·Risk Management: Construct risk assessments and remediation plans for complex service proposals and advanced technologies.·Environment Setup: Utilize Azure templates to create and configure new environments efficiently.·Network Understanding: Understand and manage Azure networking concepts to ensure secure and reliable connectivity between resources.·Documentation: Prepare and maintain comprehensive technical documentation, including architecture diagrams, process flows, and design specifications.·Subject Matter Expert: Act as a trusted advisor for technical services, providing insights and guidance to both internal and external stakeholders. Job Responsibilities·Experience with Microsoft technologies such as Visual Studio, SQL Server, and ASP.NET MVC·Ability to troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues·Meticulous attention to detail with an ability to produce high-quality work in a dynamic environment·Highly organized and able to manage multiple tasks at once and meet deadlines·Extensive skill in effective verbal and written communications with stakeholders·At least six [6] years of hands-on experience in Azure architecture and related technologies·At least six [6] years of experience in Azure DevOps, including writing CI/CD pipelines·At six years [6] years of experience in software development using C#·At least Six [6] years of experience in .NET Core development, working in a team environment·Proven technical leadership skills and ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders·Ability to analyze customer service requirements and design service solutions to meet those objectives·Understanding of Azure networking concepts and infrastructure maintenance for production and non-production environments·Ability to create and configure new Azure environments using Azure templates·Graduation from an accredited four-year college or university with a degree in computer science or a related field·Experience with PDF generation using iText and familiarity with Mulesoft and GoAnywhere·Familiarity with mainframe migration strategies using SSIS as data transformation tool.·Knowledge of mainframe technologies and systems is a plus
